content: irish hiking mittens by karin kaye an easy cable mitten pattern inspired adrian bizilia s helloyarn irish hiking scarf materials instructions 200 yards worsted weight yarn cuff same for right and left mittens size 6 double pointed needles cable needle cast on 45 stitches and divide among 3 needles stitch holder small row 1 - *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times stitch markers **k1 p1 repeat from **to end tapestry needle row 2 3 & 4 same as row 1 size medium row 5 cable row * k1 p1 c4b p1 repeat from * 2 times **k1 p1 repeat from ** to end gauge 22 stitches and 26 row equal 4 inches in stockinette stitch repeat row 1-5 four times 25 row abbreviations row 26 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k1 m1 knit19 stitches m1 k1 p1 k knit 47 stitches m1 make 1 stitch row 27 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k1 m1 knit21 stitches m1 k1 p1 49 p purl stitches dpns double pointed needles row 28 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times c4b knit cable by putting 2 stitches on cable k1 p1 knit 25 times p1 needle place in back of work knit next 2 row 29 same as row 28 stitches knit the 2 stitches off of the cable needle row 30 *k1 p1 c4b p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 knit 25 p1 k2tog knit 2 together proceed to left or right thumb gusset ssk slip one stitch knit wise slip another stitch knitwise insert left needle in front of both stitches and knit together from this position left thumb gusset row 36 * k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k1 sm k7 sm k23 p1 row 31 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k23 place marker m1 k1 m1 place row 37 * k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times marker k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm m1 k7 m1 sm k23 p1 row 32 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times row 38 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k23 slide marker sm k3 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm k9 sm k23 p1 row 33 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times row 39 * k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k23 sm m1 k3 m1 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm m1 k9 m1 sm k23 p1 row 34 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times row 40 *k1 p1 c4b p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k23 sm k5 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm k11 sm k23 p1 row 35 *k1 p1 c4b p1 repeat from * 2 times row 41 *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 2 times k1 p1 k23 sm m1
